issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

comments.body: It would be nice to tell what is the typo in JIRA.

The word "write" has been misspelled as "wrtie" in two places
 # In a log in TxnHandler.java
 # In a local variable in UpgradeTool.java
